snippet: The Academy has set dates for next year's Oscar nominations and ceremony, and the net effect is a little more time to enjoy being a nominee but a little less time to campaign for a nomination.
abstract: The Academy has set dates for next year's Oscar nominations and ceremony, and the net effect is a little more time to enjoy being a nominee but a little less time to campaign for a nomination.

headline.main: Academy Sets Oscar Dates, Crowding the Golden Globes
